name: Hijack
overview: Hijack! is a 1-player arcade game for the 8-bit Atari. The train has been hijacked, and 10 V.I.P. are among the passengers. The player controls a helicopter, and must pick up the V.I.P. from the top of the train and bring them safely to the back car. The player's helicopter can move in all directions, and the player can lower a rope to pick up the stranded individuals. The player must avoid dangerous cannon fire and trees. There are 3 different skill levels. The player receives a point bonus for quickly rescuing people.
